morning-edition.title: Morning Edtion
morning-edition.author: NPR
morning-edition.description: Morning Edition is an American radio news program produced and distributed by NPR.

all-things-considered.title: All Things Considered
all-things-considered.author: NPR
all-things-considered.description: All Things Considered combines news, analysis, commentary, interviews, and special features broadcast live daily from 4:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m. Eastern Time

weekend-edition-saturday.title: Weekend Edition Saturday
weekend-edition-saturday.author: NPR
weekend-edition-saturday.description: Saturday mornings are made for Weekend Edition Saturday, the program wraps up the week's news and offers a mix of analysis and features on a wide range of topics, including arts, sports, entertainment, and human interest stories.

weekend-edition-sunday.title: Weekend Edition Sunday
weekend-edition-sunday.author: NPR
weekend-edition-sunday.description: Weekend Edition Sunday features interviews with newsmakers, artists, scientists, politicians, musicians, writers, theologians and historians.
